original_title: Paul Rodriguez: Just for the Record
overview: One of the most popular comics of our time is back and better than ever – JUST FOR THE RECORD! Paul Rodriguez’s first one-man show tells the hilarious true story of Paul’s childhood moving from Mexico to the untamed wilds of Fresno and Compton, California and his journey to comedy stardom – with advice along the way about staying out of gangs by living on a street with a wussy name, picking the baddest Schwinn bicycle in the store, almost becoming a lawyer and providing unexpected racial diversity for his football team. Don’t miss the star of the hit show Mis Videos Locos in this once-in-a-lifetime laugh riot!
title: Paul Rodriguez: Just for the Record
